column4: anyone who knows how split works i have a file i want to split it in 2 pieces
what file are you trying to split?
hmm, you can set time limits with mencoder, probably with ffmpeg too, the later is a bit easier.
if you want graphical, I recommend, kdenlive, it is simple and seems to work well, or as stated by others, Avidemux or PiTiVi
